title: Select a Cover Crop Mix
description: A farmer wants to plant a cover crop after corn harvest to improve soil health and reduce erosion. They need a recommendation for a suitable mix.

tasks.description: Identify the farmer's primary goals for the cover crop (e.g., nitrogen scavenging, soil compaction reduction, weed suppression).
Retrieve information on various cover crop species and their attributes.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers data on species like cereal rye, tillage radish, and crimson clover.

tasks.description: Recommend a cover crop mix and seeding rates that best match the farmer's goals and geographic region.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent recommends a mix of cereal rye and tillage radish.
